post.title: Here is a new begining, and a new site
post.content: This is pretty boring, but lord knows I need some context to use as filler to work on perfecting the design. Nothing but a bunch of text junk pertaining to a more than likely pointless topic that I at some point, no doubt I was lit, was compelled to write down these worthless words of thoughts in hopes sharing them somehow attributes them value and worth. Rather, its more so the words are filler, a mere canvas for the artistic outlet of web development I so struggle with like a bought of diarrhea.
